drupalNodeEvent.title: The Evolving Role of US and China in the Global Economy

field_speakers.processed: Lawrence H. Summers (Former Secretary of the Treasury), Kevin Rudd (26th Prime Minister of Australia), Jin Liqun (President and Chair of the Board of Directors of Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank)

field_organizers.processed: Harvard University Fairbank Center For Chinese Studies

field_description.processed: This symposium is organized by China Society, a student organization at the Harvard Kennedy School.
